customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit to replace a much older Schumacher Battery Charger. The jury is still out on long lasting quality, but their technical service is to be commended. I called to ask an operating question, and after a very short wait, I got a very helpful and knowledgeable person on the line, who, after I stated my problem, had me corrected and operating the right buttons to get the job done. Once properly adjusted, the charger charged the battery in question and worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: HiPowerShooter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't inspire confidence
customer_reviews.text: It works, but feels "cheap". Lightweight, unreinforced case that probably won't hold up to much abuse. Cables are adequately sized, but the battery clamps aren't copper or even copper coated.
customer_reviews.author: Bill from 336

customer_reviews.title: Best charger I have ever owned...hands down.
customer_reviews.text: The charger is a workhorse. It's charged marine batteries, motorcycle batteries, automotive batteries etc etc and the electrons keep flowing. Just cannot go wrong with Schumacher.

customer_reviews.text: This smart unit senses your battery's condition and delivers exactly the right charging rate. I'm going to leave my camper deep-cycle batteries connected all winter.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase from Schumacher!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase from Schumacher!! I had incidents on 3 separate occasions with 2 different Schumacher chargers. 2 battery boil overs, one on a motorcycle and a large battery in a Mercedes. The other incident was an explosion on a mid-size car battery. In addition to the product not being a fully automatic controlled charger, their help desk did not respond to my inquiry regarding the incidents with their product. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. E. Green

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this Manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I recommend avoiding this manufacturer's product based on my experience with the "predecessor" model, the SC-1200A. I used this product MAYBE twice, but this morning when I took it down from the shelf and applied power, it was completely dead. There is no excuse for this given such limited usage and I can only extrapolate my expectations for the SC1393 based on first hand experience with the SC-1200A.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wolfe

product_meta.title: Schumacher SC1393 6/12V Fully Automatic Battery Charger and 12A Maintainer
product_meta.description: The Schumacher SC1393 6/12V Fully Automatic Battery Charger and 12A Maintainer is microprocessor-controlled to automatically adjust the amperage rate to charge and maintain, with multi-stage charging for added precision, safety, and battery life. Charges compatible battery types, including standard and AGM batteries. Reverse hook-up protection ensures charger will not operate if clamps are reversed. Float-mode monitoring automatically maintains optimum battery charge. Auto-voltage detection automatically detects output. Meets the highest industry standards for energy efficiency.
